about.firstParagraph: I'm an experienced web developer and I've worked with both client and server side applications. I specialize in creating robust apps. Currently I have experience working with several different technologies like Typescript, React, Nodejs, Nestjs and many more. I can also work on mobile apps using React Native or flutter as well
about.secondParagraph: Since I was little I loved the idea of making apps that could potentially help, enternain and be really useful for everybody. Today I can proudly say that, thanks to my effort and the developer community, I can be living my dream
about.thirdParagraph: If you're looking for a pasionate, motivated, critical thinking, self-taught, self-driven and eager to work in something that I'm passionate about, feel free to

projects.title: Look at some of my projects

paragraphs.2: This app allows our users to create and share projects to track bugs and issues. It also allows users to create and share tasks to track the progress of the project. The app is built with Nextjs, React, Nodejs, Vercel Functions and Postgresql
paragraphs.3: Besides, it also allows users to create and share comments to track the progress of the task and has it's own role system to allow users to fully manage their own projects

paragraphs.1: Pixel perfect twitter UI clone, this project was built using React and TailwindCss. State is handled using React Context and hooks to keep the UI in sync with the data while maintaining a clean codebase

ecommerce.title: Electroniks E-commerce

paragraphs.1: Aplicacion de comercio electrónico en la cual implemento funcionalidad de carro de compras, enrutamiento dinámico, autorización y autenticación de usuarios, productos favoritos y funcionalidad de CRUD para usuarios administradores.
paragraphs.2: Lamentablemente esta aplicación fue desarrollada únicamente con propósitos educativos y no cuenta con ningún tipo de logística real detrás de su funcionalidad, por lo cual no implementé un sistema de cobro y procesamiento de pagos (Como podría haber hecho con la API de Stripe o MercadoPago) para evitar confusiones en el caso de que alguien intente hacer una compra utilizando una tarjeta de crédito válida. Tecnologías utilizadas:

ecommerce.sideNote: Todas las animaciones están hechas con css unicamente

pokepedia.title: Pokepedia

paragraphs.1: Seguramente viste este tipo de aplicaciones de pokemon o similares un montón de veces, y hasta puede que pienses que no demuestra mucha profesionalidad. Pero me parece súper importante incluirlo en mi portafolio ya que demuestra de forma simple, e interactiva que puedo trabajar con operaciones asíncronas y obtener datos de un servidor sin ningún problema
paragraphs.2: Este fue el primer proyecto que realicé utilizando React y a pesar de que por ahí es un proyecto considerado como 'poco serio', le tengo mucho aprecio ya que me permitió aprender muchos de los conceptos que hoy manejo a diario con este fantástico framework

pokepedia.thirdParagraph: La principal funcionalidad de esta aplicación es brindar a quienes lo necesiten información sobre los juegos publicados de la saga Pokemon.

paragraphs.1: Este es uno de las primeras páginas en las que trabajé, es solamente un landing page hecho sin ningún framework
paragraphs.2: Es una recreación del landing page de una compañia llamada proof, cuyo sitio original se puede encontrar al hacer click al logo de la empresa

service1.title: Frontend Development using React
service1.description: I have vast React knowledge that allows me to create beautiful, performant and scalable solutions for any project. I understand how React works under the hood which allows me to quickly build a solution for any problem.

service2.title: Responsive web design
service2.description: I can create responsive, mobile-friendly websites that work on any device while also taking accesibilty features into account

service3.title: Native Spanish speaker
service3.description: I can speak Spanish and English fluently, which helps me communicate efficiently with more people

service4.title: Backend Development
service4.description: Experience working on server-side applications, databases and system design. My main stack is Nestjs / Express using MongoDB or SQL Server

service5.title: Problem solving
service5.description: I have criticial and analitical thinking which are crucial to deliver projects quicker

service6.title: Team Player
service6.description: I have a strong sense of collaboration and I am always ready to help others. I love cooperating as well as being able to exchange ideas and knowledge with my colleagues
